description: A white Christmas fudge that everyone will love.
name: White Chocolate Malteser Fudge Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place in the fridge for a few hours to set and then cut up into small pieces. If you are impatient like me and can't wait, pop it in the freezer! Enjoy!
